channel.title: Castlewars cloaks help
channel.description:
Hi im new and i need to make it so if your wearing say a sara cloak u can only attack people with a zammy cloak and people with zammy cloaks only attack people with sara cloaks...
Im using Mod Allstar-scape source so yeh i dont expect you to spoon feed me ( even tho i am hungry ) but you could atleast provide clear examples

item.title: Castlewars cloaks help
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:3, topic:236502”][quote author=xstrxpurez link=topic=312125.msg2487683#msg2487683 date=1223931377]
let me say it like this… your source is gay… i would never attempt to work with allstarscape… to much lag… to easy to train, and unstable along with easy to crash

and i have never seen the cloak thing done before… so it will be hard for someone to tell you unless they have attempted it.
[/quote]
Wow from reading that statement, I think your an idiot imo. You can EASILY change exp rates, remove crappy processes, change all the crappy glitchy voids, and more. Heck as we speak, I’m working on a server that USES allstar v2 and it looks WAY better than its former self. Sure the base of allstar was a bit crappy but editing it yourself without just changing home and npc can make that source look and be better.[/quote]
im not an idiot… i just think its crappy… and besides u think that guy can do all of that stuff?

Read full topic

Heck as we speak, I’m working on a server that USES allstar v2 and it looks WAY better than its former self. Sure the base of allstar was a bit crappy but editing it yourself without just changing home and npc can make that source look and be better.[/quote]

Rs2dv is probably the best framework out at the moment,
AllStarScape is just another wL server,

Unless he removed all the useless junk, And removed thread per client.

Read full topic
